p: In contrast, the core measure “introduction of a CO2 component for fossil fuels” is a clear pull measure from the field of economic instruments, which primarily aims to increase the user costs for the MPT based on conventional propulsion and fossil fuels. By privileging alternative drive systems, the measure is intended to create incentives for users to decide to purchase vehicles with alternative drive systems. This will be directly supported by the accompanying measures “reform of the motor vehicle tax” in favour of climate-friendly, fuel-efficient and light vehicles, and “guidelines on parking fees”.
